H0.text: In the Old Testament Goliath was a member of which race. Philistines' neighbors, the Amalekites

H1.text: In the Old Testament Goliath was a member of which race. Hittites

H2.text: In the Old Testament Goliath was a member of which race. Moabites

H3.text: In the Old Testament Goliath was a member of which race. Plishtim

A4.text: Goliath was a Philistine, as he was involved in battles between the Israelites and the Philistines, such as the one near the Valley of Elah where David defeated him.

A5.text: The Philistines are referred to as 'Plishtim' in Hebrew, which aligns with the hypothesis that Goliath belonged to this group.
